snippet.title: Another Brick in the Mall - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Add the game on your Steam wishlist http://store.steampowered.com/app/521150

Another Brick in the Mall is an upcoming Builder/Tycoon game for PC.

Design, build and manage a giant shopping center. Open shops, supermarkets, restaurants, movie theaters, bowling alleys and more. Hire and manage the best staff for the job and milk your customers for all they're worth! 


Official Website: http://anotherbrickinthemall.com 
Reddit: http://reddit.com/r/AnotherBrickInTheMall 
Twitter: http://twitter.com/TheQuadsphere 
Contact: info@thequadsphere.com

Trailer music:
Hall of the Mountain King - Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
